description: Pumpkin puree makes this fettuccine alfredo silky and slightly sweet, a delicious variation on the original.
name: Pumpkin Fettuccine Alfredo Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs butter, peeled and chopped into wedges
50g parmesan, grated, plus extra for serving

recipeInstructions.text: Place the pumpkin in a large bowl with a dash of water, cover with clingfilm and microwave on high for 7-8 minutes. Remove the cling film and blend with an immersion blender to puree consistency.
Cook the fettuccine according to pack instructions and drain, reserving a couple of tbs of starchy water.

Melt the butter in a large pan on medium heat, add the garlic and cook for 2-3 minutes. Add the pumpkin puree, sage and milk and cook, whisking, for 2 minutes. Add the parmesan and nutmeg and simmer for 5 minutes to reduce slightly.
Add the fettuccine and reserved starchy water (as necessary) to the pan and toss to coat. Serve with parsley, cracked black pepper and extra parmesan on top.
